select concat( 'A', replace(left(now(),10),'-',''), '-', ( select ifnull(lpad(max(right(ma_code,1)) +1,1,0),'1') from mateapply_r where substring(ma_code, 2, 8)=DATE_FORMAT(NOW(),'%Y%m%d') ) ) as code from mateapply_r group by code
INSERT INTO mateapply_r(ma_code, cp_code, mp_id, sp_id, m_date) values(#{ma_code}, #{cp_code}, #{mp_id}, #{sp_id}, #{m_date})

select ifnull(max(b_no),0)+1 as b_no from mateboard as TB
INSERT INTO mateboard(b_no, mp_id, regdt, subject, content, ct_code, m_date, gender, capacity) values(#{b_no}, #{mp_id}, now(), #{subject}, #{content}, #{ct_code}, #{m_date}, #{gender}, #{capacity})
mapper.select: select BB.*, if(aa.pp=null,0,aa.pp) people from( select mate_code, b_no, sum(people) pp from mateapply_b TB where mate_code<>0 group by b_no order by b_no desc ) AA right join mateboard BB on AA.b_no = BB.b_no order by b_no desc

select aa.ct_code as ct_code, aa.s_date as s_date, bb.m_id as m_id, date_add(aa.s_date, interval `day`-1 day) as hey from( select plan_code, ct_code, s_date, `day` from cityplan where rm_ok='Y')aa join planner bb on aa.plan_code=bb.plan_code where m_id = #{m_id} and date_add(aa.s_date, interval `day`-1 day) >= now() order by aa.s_date

select cc.*, dd.photo from(select aa.cp_code, aa.hey, aa.s_date, m_id, ct_code from( select *, date_add(s_date, interval `day`-1 day) as hey from cityplan where s_date between s_date and date_add(s_date, interval `day`-1 day) ) AA join planner as BB on AA.plan_code = BB.plan_code where AA.rm_ok = 'Y' and ct_code = #{ct_code} and m_id <> #{m_id} and date_add(aa.s_date, interval `day`-1 day) >= now() ) cc join member dd on cc.m_id=dd.m_id
